Uses of Interface
com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation.LongOperation

  • Packages that use LongOperation 
    Package Description
    com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation  
    com.samysadi.acs.hardware.pu.operation  
    com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation  
    com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation  

    • Uses of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation

      Subinterfaces of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  NetworkOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a data transmission operation between two Jobs through a given route in the network.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.network.operation that implement LongOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  NetworkOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically find a new Route using the RoutingProtocol on the host of the parent job's VM each time it is activated.

    • Uses of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.pu.operation

      Subinterfaces of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.pu.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ComputingOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a computing operation.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.pu.operation that implement LongOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ComputingOperationDefault
      This implementation will automatically seek a ProcessingUnit from the parent job's VM each time it is activated.

    • Uses of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation

      Subinterfaces of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  StorageOperation
      This interface defines methods to simulate a storage operation on a given StorageFile.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.hardware.storage.operation that implement LongOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  StorageOperationDefault
      This implementations uses, when its StorageFile is located in a remote host, a OperationSynchronizer in order to synchronize this storage operation with the network operation.
      When a remote job is needed, it is created under a new VM or, if the remote host is a ThinClient, using its main vm.

    • Uses of LongOperation in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation

      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation with type parameters of type LongOperation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  OperationDelayer<O extends LongOperation<?>>
      This interface defines an operation delayer which is used to determine when an operation should be delayed.
      Classes in com.samysadi.acs.virtualization.job.operation that implement LongOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      This is the default implementation of the LongOperation interface.
      class  SynchronizableLongOperationImpl<Resource extends LongResource>
      A LongOperationImpl that implements the SynchronizableOperation interface.
      class  TimerOperation
      A operation that runs for a given delay, then becomes completed.
